## Table of Contents

These are the scripts and results used in this project.

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
#| results: asis
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
tibble(f = list.files(pattern = ".html")) |>
  filter(!str_detect(f, "index")) |>
  mutate(name = str_remove_all(f, "(\\d+)|(.html)"),
         name = make_clean_names(name, "title"),
         name = paste0(1:n(), ". [", name, "](", f, ")\n")) |>
  pull(name) |>
  cat()
```
